About Me

Hi, my name is Wilfred and I am a fourth year Digital Media & Design student at Edinburgh Napier University, due to graduate in May!

I have a passion for digital video, photography, design and motion graphics and a drive to work with people on new and exciting projects.

My main aim as a digital media practitioner is to keep creating content on projects that inspire me.

Working mostly with video, photography and motion graphics throughout University on University briefs as well as jobs for live clients, I have built up a folio of work that showcases my diverse abilities in digital media.
